website_summaries.verdict: Symmetrical in size and designed with a keen attention to detail that creates a near-perfect grilling environment.
pros: Features commercial grade stainless steel burners
952 square inches of total cooking area
Electronic pulse ignition system allows you to start it up quickly
We love that the gas and charcoal units are organized in the same space, creating even more functional space
cons: We wish all parts were labled

customer_reviews.title: These people know how to build grills of good quality and how to package and ship.
customer_reviews.text: Arrives in two large, heavy boxes so be prepared to handle them if you need help moving them. Hand cart or two able people. Boxes were in good condition and very, very well packed. Looks like a lot of stuff and directions say two people can assemble in 50 minutes. It took me 50 minutes to open the boxes and just look at it. Once I started putting it together by myself with a good sized Phillips screwdriver it did not take so long. Takes two people to lift burner into place as both cookers are one big piece. Looks like a big job but very good directions, most parts numbered and hardware, screws all packaged and labeled.
customer_reviews.author: Leigh H. Craddock

customer_reviews.title: Assembly surprisingly, not bad at all - easy instructions and good packaging
customer_reviews.text: Brand new so, I cant write a cooking review on it just yet. However, I am certain that assembling a grill is not something most people look forward to! I give this company credit, the parts were very clearly labeled with numbers on each part, the hardware was clearly labeled and packaged and the instructions were clearly written and well thought out. They state two people will take 50 minutes.... I don't know about that, but it was not bad at all. I was pleasantly surprised. Comes in two large, heavy boxes so plan accordingly.
customer_reviews.author: Douglas Devine

customer_reviews.title: Not for me
customer_reviews.text: I wish I would have done more homework before purchasing this grill it is not for me. On the gas side 4 months in and the thermometer stop working. I've noticed the flame is not as strong as when I first purchased it. The charcoal side is to small coals are to close to the meat causing it to burn easily. If you you less coals then it takes forever to cook. This grill is only good for burgers and links in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Great grill!
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves this grill! It’s our first grill as first time home owners so we don’t have much to compare it to haha but it seems great for the price! We got it a week ago and it did take him a little while to put together on his own but it wasn’t difficult, just tedious. He has only used the charcoal side so far and loves it! We will be trying the gas side soon. The grill looks nice on our deck and so far the food he’s made has turned out fantastic!
customer_reviews.author: XENIA

customer_reviews.title: Great grill. One of the charcoal grill screw/nut that ...
customer_reviews.text: Great grill. One of the charcoal grill screw/nut that holds one of the adjustment arms was missing (must have came off in transport) so I had to replace it with the hose clamp screw and nut. Very heavy grill but it is well packed in both boxes. A couple of minor bends but I straightened them. My only concern is a good sized piece of enamel was chipped off of the front right corner of the grill. Concerned about rust at this location and I'm not sure what I can do to repair this.
customer_reviews.author: RAF

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Grill
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this grill! It's very convenient to have gas and charcoal in the same place. The grill doesn't take up too much space like other dual grills might. The stainless steel is very eye appealing. I love that the side tables can drop down when you are not using them. This grill is easy to clean up, the grease trap is easily pulled out and the old ashes are easy to dump. Delivery was right on time, it came in two large boxes. Overall it took about 4 hours for my husband to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Catherine

customer_reviews.title: Decent grill, little more expensove than I'd like but I have been enjoying it.
customer_reviews.text: Arrived with a few dings from the packing/shipping process. Nothing I couldnt correct. Overall a nice grill.
customer_reviews.author: Mark weaver

customer_reviews.title: Very well made and easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.text: Very convenient with gas and propane.I left the shelves off the end and its pushed into a pre-built outdoor kitchen are so it looks built-in. Both sides work very well and I would recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: ernsdogsam

customer_reviews.title: Decent grill does work good and only change I made was to the clip ...
customer_reviews.text: Decent grill does work good and only change I made was to the clip for the handle on the charcoal height adjuster.If you turn handle too much it will knock clip out of hole on back side.I installed and flat washer and cotter pin to eliminate this. Bought ours here because it was the best price shipped as our local stores will charge $150-200 for shipping.
customer_reviews.author: Rick

customer_reviews.title: Already rusting
customer_reviews.text: The top level of the grill has feel off because the frame rusted and is now broke. Other than that - a nice grill for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria A. Murphy

customer_reviews.title: Wrong hardware!
customer_reviews.text: I am not impressed with this unit. Don't know if they built it wrong or what but the bolts they have me to attach the lids did not fit. They are not long enough. Called waited on hold fire over 30 min. The lady on the phone was nice enough. Sent out a new set of bolts that are still to sort. Now I need to try to find the right bolts myself. Along with a few dents in the bbq it self. No damage to the box, but the grill was damaged. So no I would not recommend this grill.
customer_reviews.author: mey_girl

customer_reviews.title: Recommend
customer_reviews.text: Love this grill! The dual feature is just what I wanted. Super easy to clean and empty the ash. Raise and lower the coals with just a simple and easy crank handle. I can cook meat on the coal side and vegetables on the gas side and it's perfect. Great features, good quality but not the "best", worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Mc

customer_reviews.title: Great Grill!
customer_reviews.text: This is a super nice grill. I really love that you have charcoal and gas side by side. Great idea, and really nice grill. I am very pleased with it!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Poor factory quality control
customer_reviews.text: Dents and chipped paint almost on every corner. Otherwise the grill is not bad, great design, steady and solid for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Andriy Moskalyk

customer_reviews.title: Nice grill
customer_reviews.text: Keep the burner covers clean to avoid lots of flame ups. Other than that it's a great grill so far. Was missing a part, but customer service was great, and part arrival was prompt.
customer_reviews.author: Bob Norvell

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Great quality. 2 big boxes. Was a bit cumbersome to assemble. But great value
customer_reviews.author: Johnny Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Great grill, however it did have some dents and ...
customer_reviews.text: Great grill, however it did have some dents and pealing paint when we got it out of the box. My husband was so excited to put it together that he didn't really care, but we did end up having to buy some paint and knock some dents out to make it all work. The grill itself seems to work really well though.
customer_reviews.author: Emily Schulte

customer_reviews.title: This is a great grill for the price yes it is made out ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a great grill for the price yes it is made out of Chineseeum however it is well-designed. It is not super solid however it is just enough, went together very well. I'm very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: David B.

customer_reviews.title: This is a great BBQ. Only issue i had was some slight ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a great BBQ. Only issue i had was some slight damage to it that occurred in shipping. Having the option to do Gas or Charcoal was exactly what i needed.
customer_reviews.author: Nemesiis

customer_reviews.title: Great grill
customer_reviews.text: Shipping was great, packing was great and easy to assemble. Works great. Enjoying cooking on both sides. I usually cook on the charcoal and keep things warm on the propane side.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Montroy

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Grill, 1 issue found
customer_reviews.text: Great Grill, my only complaint after having it for one year is that it seems that the metal grate that holds the charcoal is wilted/bent. I will contact the company to understand why this happened to see if it can be rectified.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product, great price. I would definitely recommend this BBQ!
customer_reviews.text: This BBQ arrived on time. It took a bit to put together, but well worth it. We were pleasantly surprised with the price! We use the BBQ probably 2 3rds of the week, and we've never been unhappy.
customer_reviews.author: He!d! M.

customer_reviews.title: Not impressed...
customer_reviews.text: The boxes were undamaged but the sheet metal had several damaged edges, It was not quite as bad as a scratch & dent sale, but still not what was expected for a $400 grill - purchased new!!!
customer_reviews.author: Terry Allen

customer_reviews.title: Like it a lot!
customer_reviews.text: It took us about 2 hours to assemble, but we have been very happy with what we have cooked on it thus far.
customer_reviews.author: Sue

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic grill
customer_reviews.text: Great grill. All the parts fit perfectly. Very sturdy and well built. Well engineered and cooks great.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Fox

customer_reviews.title: Love duel fuel
customer_reviews.text: Works great! Very high quality materials compared to most other dual fuel grills. Never used a gas grill before - I was dedicated to charcoal only but at 71, I am thrilled to be able to setup & cook quickly with the gas side.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Lentz

customer_reviews.title: Denty
customer_reviews.text: Multiple small dents, some look like from the factory as i did not see excessive mishandling from the box. If i returned each part for a defect id have to wait for half a doz parts. I only waited for the hood the rest i banged out
customer_reviews.author: JDC

customer_reviews.title: The quality of grill was very nice and the size fits perfectly for our bbq area
customer_reviews.text: The double grill - gas or charcoal. The quality of grill was very nice and the size fits perfectly for our bbq area.
customer_reviews.author: H Bersch

customer_reviews.title: Had to return due to incomplete shipping. There was ...
customer_reviews.text: Had to return due to incomplete shipping. There was also some minor damage which I might have ignored if it was all there, but I only got one of two boxes.
customer_reviews.author: Fausto Molinet

customer_reviews.title: Really great grill
customer_reviews.text: My husband love this grill. He was a "charcoal" guy from way back, but we decided to try dual fuel when our old grill finally crumpled after many years of good service. He still does quite a bit of charcoal cooking, but you can't beat the gas side when you don't have a lot of time, or when it is really cold and snotty out. Have had not troubles with it.
customer_reviews.author: Tree Hugger

customer_reviews.title: ... a dent but as far as performance it is great!
customer_reviews.text: Box came damaged and grill has a dent but as far as performance it is great!
customer_reviews.author: Cindy Barrett

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this grill but takes a while to put together.
customer_reviews.author: J. Flenner

customer_reviews.title: Great grill
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size to have both has and charcoal pits in your outdoor kitchen
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia S

customer_reviews.title: Great grill.
customer_reviews.text: I am a big fan of charcoal grilling. Sometimes, however, I would like the speed of a gas grill if I am in a rush. This grill offers the best of both worlds in a great looking package. I have used this grill for 4 weeks. I have cooked everything from burgers to smoked pork. I am very impressed with the quality of this grill. It is perfect for having the option of a slow charcoal cook or a quick batch of hot dogs for the kids. Last week I smoked ribs on the charcoal side and sautéed vegetables on the gas side. My friends were impressed. I really like this grill. Great value and high quality.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy Freet

customer_reviews.title: They both work great. Easy to put
customer_reviews.text: Have used gas and charcoal sides. They both work great. Easy to put together
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good grill. Aarrived a bit banged up and now ...
customer_reviews.text: Good grill. Aarrived a bit banged up and now has rust at the dents after only a few weeks. But it works well and heats evenly.
customer_reviews.author: DLW

customer_reviews.title: I love this grill
customer_reviews.text: I love this grill! It took me about six hours to assemble, and I have had no issues with it. I haven't had a chance to utilize the right side yet, but I will get my chance next week.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca H. Jacoby

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy and solid. Easy to put together. East to remove parts for cleaning.
customer_reviews.author: Luke

customer_reviews.title: Built to last with great Dyna-Glo quality.
customer_reviews.text: After a few hiccups with the order (Ships in two boxes), this dual grill far exceeded my expectations. The manufacturer is extremely helpful with all issues and questions so if you need to know how something works or why something is installed one way vs another, just reach out to them. I would highly recommend this grill if you can't decide between gas or charcoal or if you like the taste of charcoal but need the convenience of gas. It's well designed with plenty of convenient features. Installation was a breeze with detailed photo instructions. It feels like it's very robust and will last a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Victor

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful grill! Easy cleaning! Glad my Dad was in town to put it together for me!!!
customer_reviews.author: Kim Bynum

customer_reviews.title: great looking and functionig grill.
customer_reviews.text: once assembled it is awesome...simply Fantastic. I gave it a 4 stars because some parts were not labeled...
customer_reviews.author: B-man

customer_reviews.title: I wanted to give this five stars. My dad ...
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to give this five stars. My dad loves the grill. We did however, receive a unit that was severely dented and had to be bent/hammered back into shape in order to be put together The dented areas will surely rust quickly, so we'll have to front the money to repair them. If nothing else, I hope the manufacturer sees this and steps up their storage/shipping game. This grill was very clearly dropped - hard - and, were my father not so handy, there would have been no way to get the grill put together.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The best of both worlds!
customer_reviews.text: There is a battle in my home. Which is better? Gas or charcoal. Now we have the best of both. The husband and I can have cook offs to see who is right. :D My husband wanted a new charcoal grill, and I wanted a gas grill. I bought this for him for Father's Day. We considered buying one of each, but were so happy to find both. I'll be honest, so far we have only used the gas side. It's easy to ignite. The food has been cooking evenly. The space on the grill is ample. It's beautiful!
customer_reviews.author: Abba

customer_reviews.title: Dented and scratched.
customer_reviews.text: The grill is okay. For what i paid i am a little upset it was banged up with dents and scratches.
customer_reviews.author: CRYSTAL

customer_reviews.title: Grill porcelain was already chipped on arrival
customer_reviews.text: I am really unhappy with the fact that we paid decent money for this grill and when we received it there were 5 good sized chips in the porcelain which mean there will be rust forming in those areas. We would have returned it but unfortunately we need it for this weekend, so there is no time. I am so frustrated about the condition of the grill upon arrival. The grill overall looks like it will be decent but now we are going to have to deal with rust issues sooner than usual.
customer_reviews.author: Jacolyn Bailey

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: The product arrived damaged and dented though exterior shipping box was intact.
customer_reviews.author: LMREYES1

customer_reviews.title: grill is good quality like the option of both charcoal and gas
customer_reviews.text: grill is good quality like the option of both charcoal and gas. Like the two side stands that fold down. For us a burner on the grill was never used. THis is more useful and gives extra space. We got a quick charcoal starter too and it is great. I would recommend this grill.
customer_reviews.author: Holly G. Perry

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Item arrived on time but damaged. Unable to return the bulky item.
customer_reviews.author: May

customer_reviews.title: Okay
customer_reviews.text: Pretty good for the price, especially considering the lack of options for dual fuel grills.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Dyna - Glo Dual Fuel, Can't go wrong
customer_reviews.text: Great grill. Can opener is weak. Gas and charcoal cook great. Having the adjustability to move the charcoal tray up or down is a nice option. One of the better dual fuel grills I've seen.
customer_reviews.author: C Turner

customer_reviews.title: every thing she wanted easy to put together fun to
customer_reviews.text: birthday gift, every thing she wanted easy to put together fun to use
customer_reviews.author: crodrig

customer_reviews.title: Great dual Grill
customer_reviews.text: Just got it two days ago and put it together yesterday. Haven't used it yet but it seems like its exactly what we needed. Makes a lot of noise when you move it but that is to be expected since some parts aren't bolted down like the grill plates. Came in two boxes on the same day. About 100lbs. each. Lots of Styrofoam packaging. Easy to fallow instructions. Took about 3.5 hours to put together.
customer_reviews.author: Hicks D.

customer_reviews.title: The parts that I did get looks good, but what is good looking if it don't ...
customer_reviews.text: Be careful buying this package it is a two part package and I still haven't received package 2 of 2. Do not buy this with any other package or you will not get package 2 of 2, this the mistake I've made and now the price went up a hundred dollars. If I return I loose money. The parts that I did get looks good, but what is good looking if it don't work or function.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: the order was not complete and was missing lots of parts
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Charcoal side is good for steaks and burgers, but not for meats requiring longer cook times
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Just like the picture!
customer_reviews.text: My husband has been looking for a grill every time we go to the store to replace a 10 year old one we had. I decided to surprise him with this Dyna-Glo Dual Fuel Grill. It arrived in two boxes one on a Friday the other on Tuesday (stupid I know). My grill came with a section damaged but Amazon made good on it. After hours of assembly it wasn't worth the hassle to return it for a new one. Amazon save the say in the end. My advice is know up front you wont get this all in one day..... make sure you understand there is time between deliveries.
customer_reviews.author: I'm Thrifty but Like Nice Things!

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous Grill
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a welcome home gift for my deployed husband. I loved how simple the instructions were to put it together and how everything was neatly organized and labeled. I was not too fond of the delivery method however. My package was separated into two separate boxes, which was fine, but each box went through a different delivery service. I would have preferred for them to go together. Other than that this grill is gorgeous and I cannot wait for my husband to see it! I have not used it yet so that is why I am giving it 4 stars.
customer_reviews.author: samantha A Moake

product_meta.title: Dyna-Glo DGB730SNB-D Dual Fuel Grill
product_meta.description: Offering a total cooking surface of 940 square Inch, this Dyna Glo grill features dual fuel functionality (LP Gas and Charcoal) and provides plenty of space to cook for many people at a time. The lid assembly has a double-wall stainless steel sleeve and easy-to-grip handles. The convenience of gas and the flavor of charcoal make this a great grill for the griller who enjoys both and wants a great looking grill on their patio.
feature_bullets: Commercial grade stainless steel burners for ultimate performance and durability
Heavy duty porcelain enameled cast iron cook grates retain heat to sear foods and lock in foods natural juices
Charcoal tray adjustment system for ultimate heat control; Electronic pulse ignition system ensures quick and reliable ignition
952 square Inch of total cooking area offers significant cooking space; Grill up to 38 hamburgers to feed family and friends
24,000 TOTAL BTU's generating lots of cooking power

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.1 out of 5 stars89 ratings4.1 out of 5 stars
